blogEntry.title: Summer of Code 2012
blogEntry.subtitle: Summer of Clojure
blogEntry.body:
LispNYC was not selected as a mentoring organization this year, however related organizations DID get in and there is plenty of work to be done.  Visit their sites for info:

  • Clojure/core
  • Haskell
  • OpenCog

LispNYC is devoted to helping where we can, if you have lisp/functional-related questions or are looking for a mentor, just ping us.
blogEntry.author: heow
